ValidationRule.description: PC Carrier Sold and Child Id fields are required when moving the status to Verbal Commit with Probability: 70%
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), BEGINS($RecordType.DeveloperName, 'PC'), OR( BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Administration - SB'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Manager - SB'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Rep - SB') ), (Probability==0.7), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Child_ID__c, ""), OR( ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'AUTO'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,"BOP (Business Owner's Package)"), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Disability'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Umbrella'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Workers Comp'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'General Liability'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Errors and Omissions') ) ),
AND( ISBLANK(Tarmika_Quote__c), ISPICKVAL(PC_Carrier_Sold__c, ""), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"ERISA")), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"Cyber")), NOT(CONTAINS (TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"Referral")) ),
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Primary_Opportunity__c)), ISBLANK(Primary_Opportunity__r.Tarmika_Quote__c), ISPICKVAL(PC_Carrier_Sold__c, ""), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"ERISA")), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"Cyber")), NOT(CONTAINS (TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"Referral")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PC Carrier Sold and Child Id fields are required when moving the status to Verbal Commit with Probability: 70%
